item.text: POSIWID is an expression coined by
POSIWID is an expression coined by Stafford Beer.
POSIWID - "Purpose of the System is What it Does" is an expression coined by Stafford Beer known for his work in the fields of operational research and management cybernetics.
It is very useful when speaking about complex systems and interactions within and between them.

story.text: POSIWID - "Purpose of the System is What it Does" is an expression coined by Stafford Beer known for his work in the fields of operational research and management cybernetics.
